title: Speakers don't work after disconnecting Bluetooth headphone
content:
After the recent Android update, I started facing this issue where the speaker doesn't work after I disconnect my Bluetooth headphones. I tried disabling and enabling the Bluetooth, changing the "Play media to" to "this device" while the headphones are connected, and turning off the headphones.

Nothing worked, now I have to restart the device to get the speakers to work any time I connect my Bluetooth headphones.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
